contents:
disableRow：禁用某一行可选状态，类型：Function，默认：function(data, index) { return false }，该函数如果返回true，则表示禁用该行可选

禁用的数据默认会在每一行的元素上有k-disabled样式

highlighted.content:
import Table from 'kpc/components/table';

const scheme = {a: '奇数行不可点击'};
const data = [{a: '1'}, {a: '2'}, {a: '3'}, {a: '4'}, {a: '5'}]


<Table scheme={{ scheme }} data={{ data }}
    disableRow={{ (data, index) => index % 2 !== 0 }}
/>

import Intact from 'intact';
import template from './index.vdt';
import './index.styl'; 

export default class extends Intact {
    @Intact.template()
    static template = template;
}
